page.title: 08SCHOOL SURVEY 4
page.content: 12.Do you attend a local{church?} -The majority attend St.Mary's church,Walkhampton and some others attended St.Peter's,Yelverton. Five didn't go to church. 13.Do you attend a local{society?} -Most of the girls attend Brownies and most of the boys attend Cubs. (Walkham Valley Sections) 14.What are your favourite{leisure } {time activities? } {a)Indoor} Computer games,board games e.g. Cluedo, Monopoly. b){Outdoor,}horse riding and bikes (eg.BMX. biking.) c){Playground}games, cricket, football, Bulldog (a catching game) d){Television}- half and half between children's and adults' programmes eg.Dogtanian, (children), The Young Ones(!!), (adult) Knight Rider (both), Soap Opera eg. Dallas & Dynasty.
